headline: Assessing International Flavors & Fragrances (IFF) Valuation After Mixed Share Price Performance
summary: What recent performance says about International Flavors & Fragrances With no single headline event driving attention, International Flavors & Fragrances (IFF) is drawing interest after a mixed performance, including a roughly 9% gain over the past 3 months but a 17% decline over the past year. See our latest analysis for International Flavors & Fragrances. At a share price of $66.96, International Flavors & Fragrances is trying to rebuild confidence. A 9.23% 90 day share price return...
